#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <climits>
#include <algorithm>
#include <queue>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <string>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <string>
#include <deque>
#include <ctime>
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define ss(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define s2(a,b) scanf("%d%d",&a,&b)
#define SET(p)      memset(p,-1,sizeof(p))
#define CLR(p)      memset(p,0,sizeof(p))
#define vi vector<int>
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define F first
#define S second
#define LL long long
#define ULL unsigned long long
#define R freopen("in","r",stdin)
#define W freopen("out","w",stdout)
using namespace std;
vi arr;
int a[111];
int main()
{
    //R;W;
    int t,c=0;cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        c++;
        int n,k;
        s(n);s(k);
        arr.clear();
        arr.resize(n);
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)s(arr[i]);
        sort(arr.begin(),arr.end());
        reverse(arr.begin(),arr.end());
        int val[1111];
        memset(val,-1,sizeof(val));
        
        for(int i=0;i<k && i<n;i++)
        {
            val[i]=1;
        }
        int in=min(k,n);
        while(in<n)
        {
            LL ans=0;
            for(int l=in;l<in+k-1 && l<n;l++)
            {
                ans+=arr[l];
            }
            int ind=0;
            for(int l=0;l<in;l++)
            {
                if((arr[l]+1LL*(val[l]+1)*ans)<(arr[ind]+1LL*(val[ind]+1)*ans))ind=l;
            }
            val[ind]++;
            for(int l=in;l<in+k-1 && l<n;l++)val[l]=val[ind];
            in=min(in+k-1,n);
            
        }
        LL ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)ans+=1LL*val[i]*arr[i];
        printf("Case %d: %lld\n",c,ans);
        //cout<<ans<<endl;
        
        
    }
}
